name: Oh, No! More Lemmings
description:
Oh, No! More Lemmings is an arcade game developed by DMA Design. It came out on 12-01-1991. Psygnosis published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Oh, No! More Lemmings is available on PC, Classic Macintosh, Atari ST and Commodore / Amiga.
It was produced by David Jones. David Jones and John White directed the game. It was scored by Brian Johnston, Matt Furniss and Tony Williams.
